name: Emily Reece
text: Pizza was phenomenal; service, not so much. They didn’t acknowledge that I was there even when they saw me, and I was the only one inside. When they finally did acknowledge me, they weren’t very friendly or inviting. They also didn’t notify …More

name: Angelia Bella
text: Great place to grab a quick pizza, and go. They have a lot of options, and a choose your own topping’s option, as well. They offer salads but it’s sitting in hot kitchen, so mine was a little warm, and wilted. However, their pizza was …More

name: Gabbstar M
text: Went there and customer service was great, obviously need to wear a mask.  The girl Gaby and the manger were great. The worker serves the drinks. There are tables outside for eating which is great.

text: It was my first time here at the Blaze pizza on Sunset in Hollywood. Staff members are friendly and courteous.David is definitely an example to excellent service to the client. He helped me out with my choices of flavors with pizzas and …More

text:

name: C M
text: Good franchise pizza... you won't be mad. But you won't be doing cart-wheels either.

name: Austin Nooe
text: The guy who took and made my order was super professional, friendly and helpful. Pizza was perfect and when I didn't know what I was wanting he made some recommendations.

name: E Trejo
text: I love being able to build my own pizza. I always leave this place being full and satisfied. If you've never been here I highly recommend you try it.  Prices are very reasonable in my opinion.

name: Desiré Peoples
text: I pre-ordered. It was ready on time. Busy but they still had great customer service. I love the cauliflower crust. It is so good, I recommend it, if you're not allergic to diary.

name: Arora Law Offices
text: Stumbled upon this new location the other night while visiting LA. Couldn’t have been better! The staff is amazing. Had a great time there. Sat outside, people watching on Sunset while enjoying our meal. The beer on tap tasted great. Hats off to Skylar and his team.

name: Bella Gold
text: So today I had the pleasure of reviewing a grand new opening off of sunset and vine. What an incredibly energetic and attentive team. Not only did they bring their community together by offering free pizza for their grand opening, but they …More

name: Sarah Schwanbeck
text: Very nice pizza but service was pretty terrible from one team member, but All the others were good. Atmosphere is kind of industrial, they make custom, to order pizzas very, very quickly. You order and wait like five minutes, then you delicious pizza is ready.

name: André Mutanga
text: I’m proposing a rebranding... Frozen Pizza should be the new name. The place was as cold as the pizzas and the service. Except the products tasted good when I asked to have another pizza isntead. …More

name: skyexbluu
text: Got email for free upgrade & to ask in line next visit..i waited in line,asked,got denied to upgrade to large shareable pizza...ONLY online.. sorry but idk why app says in stores? Pointed me to a new line eventually i was able to get 3 smalls instead- 40$ w/drinks. Instead of my coupon 12 $ lol new location is nice

text: Rude people, mediocre food. You`ll be better off buying frozen and warming it up.

text: Just as good as their Pasadena location!  Friendly service and great pizza!

text: I have found Blaze Pizza to be very hit and miss. It really depends on who is working at the time. They have a few employee's that do a great job of cooking the pizza and then there are a few that have a tendency to over cook the pizza. …More

text: The thin crust make youre own pizza is awsome. I had them put garlic pesto sauce, riccota and mozzerella cheese , and veggie toppings and it was delishes. Try it, i assume youll like it aswell.
